text: 12.12: Ais 44.23; 49.13; VB 8.13; 10.6; 11.10; 18.20Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde Hevenan ki ntɨɨri, nde zam ndikndigɨri. Nde nuian gu mbasɨgar ki ntɨɨri, simtɨga bakɨme nden hɨr za mbui. Satan ŋkon han zergi. Ana guigira ndav shigi. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana vhɨra kaŋgi, ana kha nuianan kɨrga tuga tɨvaneŋra.”
